import React from 'react'; import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector} from 'react-redux'; import CheckOutSteps from '../components/checkOutSteps'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(props) { const cart =useSelector((state)=>state.cart); if(!cart.paymentMethod) { props.history.push('/payment'); } return (

  • Shippping

    Name: {cart.shippingAddress.fullName}
    Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address} , {cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} , {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order Items

      { cart.cartItems.map((item)=> (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty}x ${item.price}=${item.qty*item.price}
      • )) }
) }
